channel.description: CC 410 - Week 8 This Week Design Patterns Test Doubles Patterns & Mocks Example Next Week Restaurant Milestone 6 Final Project 3 Milestone 6 Orders & Combos Design Patterns Factory Method, Builder, Singleton, Iterator Unit Tests with Doubles Few GUI Changes Milestone 6 Tips Orders First (Singleton) Combos Second (Builder & Menu) Panel Factory Third Make Unit Tests As You Go Document and Fix Style As You Go Testing Issues Limited Memory (512 MB) Java: gradle --stop Project -> Restart Box Refresh Browser Python: run tests in batches Develop Outside of Codio Looking Ahead Module 10 - External Libraries Module 11 - Releases Milestone 7 - Checkout Web APIs, etc.
